name: Satoru Miyano
content: profile Name : Satoru Miyano (Male) Title : Professor, Dr.Sc. Date of Birth : December 5, 1954 Affiliation : Human Genome Center, Institute of Medical Science The University of Tokyo 4-6-1 Shirokanedai, Minato-ku, Tokyo 108-8639, Japan Phone Number : +81-3-5449-5615 Fax Number : +81-3-5449-5442 E-mail: miyano@ims.u-tokyo.ac.jp Academic Recoed April 1973 - March 1977 BS: Department of Mathematics, Kyushu University April 1977 - March 1979 Master of Science: Department of Mathematics, Kyushu University Doctor of Science: April 24, 1984, Kyushu University Professional Record Research Institute of Fundamental Information Science, Kyushu University June 1, 1979 - June 30, 1981: Assistant Professor Department of Mathematics, Kyushu University July 1, 1981 - March 31, 1984: Assistant Professor Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, Northwestern University, USA September 1981 - July1982: Visiting Researcher University of Paderborn, Germany 1985 - 1987: Alexander von Humboldt Research Fellow Research Institute of Fundamental Information Science, Kyushu University December 1, 1987 - February 28, 1993: Associate Professor March 1, 1993 - March 31, 1996: Professor University of Paris VII, France 1994: Guest Professor Human Genome Center, Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo April 1, 1996 - : Professor Institutional Heads Director, Research Institute of Information Science, Kyushu University April 1, 1994 - March 31, 1996 Vice Director, Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo April 1, 2000 - March 31, 2003 Vice Director, Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo April 1, 2004 - Awards 1994: IBM Science Award 1994: Sakai Special Award Academic Societies President, Japanese Society for Bioinformatics (April 1, 2003 -- March 31, 2005) Board of Directors, International Society for Computational Biology (2004 -- ) President, Association of Asian Societies for Bioinformatics (-- Dec 2004) Journal Editors Bioinformatics, Associate Editor (Oxford University Press) Journal of Bioinformatics and Computational Biology, Editor (World Scientific) PLoS Computational Biology, Associate Editor Genome Informatics, Editor-in-Chief (Universal Academy Press) Lecture Notes in Bioinformatics, Editor (Springer-Verlag) IEEE/ACM Transactions on Computational Biology and Bioinformatics Transactions on Computational Systems Biology, Editor (LNCS Subline) Theoretical Computer Science, Editor (Elsevier) New Generation Computing, Editor International Journal of Asian Information-Science-Life, Editor (Nova Publ.) Annual Review of Intelligent Informatics, Editor Bulletin of Informatics, Editor Research Areas Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Genome Informatics, Discovery Science
